design_audit.model_formula: incres09 ~ cert1* + cert2* + instid*, no causal interpretation
design_audit.selection_story: Descriptive analysis characterizing online postsecondary education markets. No causal claims. Regressions test joint significance of certificate and institution indicators.
design_audit.notes: Paper is primarily descriptive (tabulations, summary statistics) with two regressions that test joint significance only. No focal coefficient or causal estimate is reported.

claim_object.treatment_concept: Certificate attainment indicators (qfcsfct, qfcslct) and institution indicators
claim_object.estimand_concept: Joint F-test of certificate and institution effects on earnings (explicitly non-causal)
claim_object.target_population: NSPE (nonselective postsecondary education) students in BPS 2004/2009

baseline_specs.label: NSPE-earnings-regression
baseline_specs.notes: This regression exists solely for the F-tests (testparm cert*; testparm instid*). No focal coefficient is reported. The paper says 'No causal interpretation.'

constraints.notes: PRIMARY CONSTRAINT: This paper is descriptive. The regressions are ancillary F-tests, not the paper's main claims. The paper's main contribution is characterizing NSPE and HSPE market segments through tabulations and summary statistics. A specification search is of very limited value.
